actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the President's action under section 203 of the Trade Act of 1974 (August 28, 1976).

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of Congress with respect to the action taken by, or the determination of, the President (under the authority conferred by the Trade Act of 1974) to adjust customs duties to prevent serious injury to an industry) transmitted to the Congress on August 28, 1976.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the President's action under section 203 of the Trade Act of 1974 (August 28, 1976).
